title: "Facebook AI & JHU’s MaskFeat Method Surpasses Kaiming He’s MAE, Sets New SOTA in Video Action Recognition"
excerpt: "In November, a Facebook AI Research (FAIR) team led by Kaiming He published the paper Masked Autoencoders Are Scalable Vision Learners, which demonstrated that masked autoencoders (MAE) are scalable self-supervised learners — a game-changing finding for the computer vision research field."
